remarks: A sylow subgroup has cardinality equal to the maximum power of ` P ` dividing the group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jan-2015.)
statement:
fislw.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
slwhash.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
slwhash.4 $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( P pSyl G ) ) $.
slwhash $p |- ( ph -> ( # ` H ) = ( P ^ ( P pCnt ( # ` X ) ) ) ) $.
